title:
Blackberry & Mint Margarita
Serves 1
directions: Place blackberries and mint in cocktail shaker.Â Press firmly on solids with muddler or back of wooden spoon until mashed. Add tequila, lime juice, agave plus half a cup of ice. Shake for 15 to 20 seconds. Pour mixture through strainer over ice in a double old fashioned glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.
*The above recipe works for many different fruit and vegetable combinations. Other options to try: blueberries and strawberries, cucumber and orange, thyme and cucumber, watermelon and orange.
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces silver tequila (such as Republic or El Tesoro)
